dc_title_s: Carte chorographique du comte d'Avignon et la prinicipaute d'Orenge.
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. North is oriented to the bottom of the map. From the Composite Atlas of France, title created to represent a unique collection within the Clark Library, University of Michigan. 1 map; 36 x 48 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Hondius, Jodocus, 1594 or 1595-1629.,Hondius, Hendrik, 1597-1651, cartographer.,Hamersveldt, Everard Symonsz, 1591-1653, engraver.,Vignaud, Henry, 1830-1922, former owner, Composite Atlas of France.
